name: Tmpr DB 7day
query:
SELECT mean("temperature") 
FROM "environment" 
WHERE "device" = 'home/thermometer/hall' 
  AND time > now() - 7d 
GROUP BY time(30m) 
fill(null) 
tz('Europe/Bratislava')

name: Tmpr IDB to Chart
MQTT to InfluxDB
InfluxDB iot_data 2
Humi DB 7day
query:

name: Humi IDB to Chart
Request to DB
info:
## Description: 
Trigger request to DB with 1min cycle

## Note: 
msg.payload = (String)"ReadDdata" - is not relevant, it is ignored by next node (DB).

name: Points in chart
info:
# Chart - number of points in chart

## number of measurements on the sensor
define LOOP_TIME 6000
One measurement per 6sec => for 60sec is executed 10 measurements. 
60/6 = 10 measurements per minute (10/1min)

Point Reduction:

 Time  |  Agregation   |          Points in chart
 6 hod | 20:  1m/2min  | (1/2)/1min x 60min x 6hod  = 180
24 hod | 60:  1m/6min  | (1/6)/1min x 60min x 24hod = 240
 3 dni | 200: 1m/20min |  3/1hod x 72               = 216
 7 dni | 300: 1m/30min |  2/1hod x 168              = 336

180+240+240 = 660 points in chart ( RAM must be used ).

name: Tmpr DB 3day
query:
SELECT mean("temperature") 
FROM "environment" 
WHERE "device" = 'home/thermometer/hall' 
  AND time > now() - 3d 
GROUP BY time(20m) 
fill(null) 
tz('Europe/Bratislava')
info:
Ak chcete oddeliť dáta a zobraziť priemernú teplotu len pre senzor v hale, 
musíte do dopytu pridať podmienku WHERE s identifikátorom zariadenia.

Tu je upravený príkaz:
SQL

SELECT mean("temperature") 
FROM "environment" 
WHERE "device" = 'home/thermometer/hall' 
  AND time > now() - 3d 
GROUP BY time(20m) 
fill(null) 
tz('Europe/Bratislava')

Čo sa zmenilo?
    -Pridal som podmienku "device" = 'home/thermometer/hall'.
    -V InfluxDB sa táto podmienka spája s časovým rozsahom pomocou operátora AND.
    -Dôležité je použiť jednoduché úvodzovky (') pre hodnotu tagu (názov zariadenia) 
    a dvojité úvodzovky (") pre názvy polí a tagov (device, temperature), 
    ak obsahujú špeciálne znaky.
